page.title: 14Farm buildings
page.content: The farm which my class went to see was Mr Elliot's. It is a modern farm. {The cattle house holds up to 150 {cattle. }It is divided into six sections, three down each side. The roof has ventilators to let the hot air out. This keeps it from getting too hot in the shed. Another house on the farm is the{pig house which has small walls built to divide it into pens for sows and their piglets. {It is dark and stuffy in the pig {house. Another building is the{meal house {which is automatically controlled so {that when Mr Elliot presses a button a {measured amount of meal comes down a {chute. He can then take the meal to {the required animal.
